Notes: A controller that activates SW_A depending on the states of several consecutive input switches. Supported logical links are AND and OR. The first index of the input switches has to be set as SW_B and the number of total consecutive switches has to be specified by Obj_arg0.

Obj_arg0.Name: Number of Switches
Obj_arg0.Description: The number of switches to be evaluated.

Obj_arg1.Name: Logical Link
Obj_arg1.Description: Specifies how the input switches are evaluated.

Values.Notes: AND (all switches have to be activated)

Obj_arg2.Name: Activation Type
Obj_arg2.Description: How the output switch (SW_A) should be activated or deactivated.

Values.Notes: Activate SW_A if condition is fulfilled and kill itself
Activate SW_A if condition is fulfilled, deactivate SW_A otherwise

SW_A.Description: The switch that should be activated or deactivated depending on the result.

SW_B.Description: The first index of the input switches to be evaluated.
